CustomField.inlineHelpText: For rule type Key Value Query which is used to apply rules to 2 fields in just one rule: 1. Field API Name must include 2 fields separated by semi-colon. 2. The first of these 2 fields must be of type 'Text'. 3. The selected operator and field type applies to only second field. 4. The first field will use equals operator and the second field will use the operator selected.
CustomField.label: Rule Type
